message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, given your needs.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,900,000.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value to me, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $1,700,000 for it.
Bob, I understand you have budget considerations, but my initial price reflects the true value of this product. I could meet you halfway at $1,800,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,800,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,600,000 for the product.
Bob, I'm sensing some hesitation on your end. This product is truly one-of-a-kind, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. My last offer is $1,750,000. I believe that's more than fair.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,500,000 for it.
